bwwExcerpt: The alchemy of this retooled Vanya, combining a top-notch creative team with serious actors who are currently having A Moment, works brilliantly. I'd call it blockbuster Chekhov if it weren't so subtle and sad. Toby Jones is in his comic prime in the title role, a man faced with the waste of his life. Hobbit heart-throb Richard Armitage is a forceful if one-dimensional study of self-destructive idealism as his friend and rival, Astrov.
wrongShowReason: URL is a BWW critic profile page, not a review
